Domain Generalization via Invariant Feature Representation
领域泛化通过不变特征表示

Krikamol Muandet

Abstract
摘要

This paper investigates domain generalization: How to take knowledge acquired from an arbitrary number of related domains and apply it to previously unseen domains? We propose Domain-Invariant Component Analysis (DICA), a kernel-based optimization algorithm that learns an invariant transformation by minimizing the dissimilarity across domains, whilst preserving the functional relationship between input and output variables. A learning-theoretic analysis shows that reducing dissimilarity improves the expected generalization ability of classifiers on new domains, motivating the proposed algorithm. Experimental results on synthetic and real-world datasets demonstrate that DICA successfully learns invariant features and improves classifier performance in practice.
本文研究领域泛化问题：如何将从任意数量的相关领域中获取的知识应用到之前未见过的领域中？我们提出了领域不变成分分析（DICA），这是一种基于核的优化算法，通过最小化领域间的相似性差异，同时保留输入和输出变量之间的功能关系，来学习不变变换。学习理论分析表明，减少相似性差异可以提高分类器在新领域上的预期泛化能力，从而证明了所提出算法的合理性。在合成数据集和现实世界数据集上的实验结果表明，DICA成功地学习了不变特征，并在实际中提高了分类器的性能。

1. Introduction
1. 引言

Domain generalization considers how to take knowledge acquired from an arbitrary number of related domains, and apply it to previously unseen domains. To illustrate the problem, consider an example taken from Blanchard et al. (2011) which studied automatic gating of flow cytometry data. For each of N patients,a set of ni cells are obtained from peripheral blood samples using a flow cytometer. The cells are then labeled by an expert into different subpopulations, e.g., as a lymphocyte or not. Correctly identifying cell subpopulations is vital for diagnosing the health of patients.
领域泛化考虑如何将从任意数量的相关领域中获取的知识应用到之前未见过的领域中。为了说明这个问题，考虑一个来自Blanchard等人（2011年）的例子，该研究探讨了流式细胞仪数据的自动门控。对于 N 位患者，通过流式细胞仪从外周血样本中获得一组 ni 细胞。然后由专家将这些细胞标记为不同的亚群，例如，是否为淋巴细胞。正确识别细胞亚群对于诊断患者的健康状况至关重要。
However, manual gating is very time consuming. To automate gating, we need to construct a classifier that generalizes well to previously unseen patients, where the distribution of cell types may differ dramatically from the training data.
然而，手动分选非常耗时。为了自动化分选，我们需要构建一个分类器，使其能够很好地泛化到之前未见过的患者，其中细胞类型的分布可能与训练数据有显著差异。
Unfortunately, we cannot apply standard machine learning techniques directly because the data violates the basic assumption that training data and test data come from the same distribution. Moreover, the training set consists of heterogeneous samples from several distributions, i.e., gated cells from several patients. In this case, the data exhibits covariate (or dataset) shift (Widmer and Kurat, 1996; Quionero-Candela et al., 2009; Bickel et al., 2009): although the marginal distributions PX on cell attributes vary due to biological or technical variations, the functional relationship P(Y∣X) across different domains is largely stable (cell type is a stable function of a cell's chemical attributes).
不幸的是，由于数据违反了训练数据与测试数据来自同一分布的基本假设，我们无法直接应用标准的机器学习技术。此外，训练集由来自多个分布的异质样本组成，即来自多个患者的分选细胞。在这种情况下，数据表现出协变量（或数据集）偏移（Widmer和Kurat，1996；Quionero-Candela等人，2009；Bickel等人，2009）：尽管由于生物学或技术变异，细胞属性上的边际分布 PX 会变化，但不同领域之间的功能关系 P(Y∣X) 大致是稳定的（细胞类型是细胞化学属性的稳定函数）。
A considerable effort has been made in domain adaptation and transfer learning to remedy this problem, see Pan and Yang (2010); Ben-David et al. (2010) and references therein. Given a test domain, e.g., a cell population from a new patient, the idea of domain adaptation is to adapt a classifier trained on the training domain, e.g., a cell population from another patient, such that the generalization error on the test domain is minimized. The main drawback of this approach is that one has to repeat this process for every new patient, which can be time-consuming - especially in medical diagnosis where time is a valuable asset. In this work, across-domain information, which may be more informative than the domain-specific information, is extracted from the training data and used to generalize the classifier to new patients without retraining.
在领域适应和迁移学习方面已经做出了相当大的努力来解决这个问题，参见Pan和Yang（2010）；Ben-David等人（2010）及其中引用的文献。给定一个测试领域，例如来自新患者的细胞群体，领域适应的想法是适应在训练领域上训练的分类器，例如来自另一个患者的细胞群体，使得在测试领域上的泛化错误最小化。这种方法的主要缺点是，对于每个新患者，都必须重复这个过程，这在时间宝贵的医疗诊断中尤其耗时。在这项工作中，从训练数据中提取跨领域信息，这可能比领域特定信息更具启发性，并用于在没有重新训练的情况下将分类器泛化到新患者。
Proceedings of the 30th  International Conference on Machine Learning, Atlanta, Georgia, USA, 2013. JMLR: W&CP volume 28. Copyright 2013 by the author(s).
30th  国际机器学习会议论文集，亚特兰大，乔治亚州，美国，2013年。JMLR: W&CP卷28。版权所有2013年由作者（们）所有。
Figure 1. A simplified schematic diagram of the domain generalization framework. A major difference between our framework and most previous work in domain adaptation is that we do not observe the test domains during training time. See text for detailed description on how the data are generated.
图 1。领域泛化框架的简化示意图。我们的框架与大多数领域适应的先前工作的主要区别在于，我们在训练期间并不观察测试领域。有关数据生成方式的详细描述，请参见正文。
Overview. The goal of (supervised) domain generalization is to estimate a functional relationship that handles changes in the marginal P(X) or conditional P(Y∣X) well,see Figure 1. We assume that the conditional probability P(Y∣X) is stable or varies smoothly with the marginal P(X) . Even if the conditional is stable, learning algorithms may still suffer from model misspecification due to variation in the marginal P(X) . That is, if the learning algorithm cannot find a solution that perfectly captures the functional relationship between X and Y then its approximate solution will be sensitive to changes in P(X) .
概述。监督领域泛化的目标是估计一个功能关系，该关系能够妥善处理边缘 P(X) 或条件 P(Y∣X) 的变化，见图 1。我们假设条件概率 P(Y∣X) 是稳定的或随边缘 P(X) 平滑变化。即使条件是稳定的，由于边缘 P(X) 的变化，学习算法仍可能因模型误指定而受到影响。也就是说，如果学习算法无法找到一个完美捕捉 X 和 Y 之间功能关系的解决方案，那么它的近似解决方案将对 P(X) 的变化敏感。
In this paper, we introduce Domain Invariant Component Analysis (DICA), a kernel-based algorithm that finds a transformation of the data that (i) minimizes the difference between marginal distributions PX of domains as much as possible while (ii) preserving the functional relationship P(Y∣X) .
在本文中，我们引入了领域不变成分分析（DICA），这是一种基于核的算法，它找到数据的转换，以便 (i) 尽可能减少领域边缘分布 PX 之间的差异，同时 (ii) 保留功能关系 P(Y∣X)。
The novelty of this work is twofold. First, DICA extracts invariants: features that transfer across domains. It not only minimizes the divergence between marginal distributions P(X) ,but also preserves the functional relationship encoded in the posterior P(Y∣X) . The resulting learning algorithm is very simple. Second, while prior work in domain adaptation focused on using data from many different domains to specifically improve the performance on the target task, which is observed during the training time (the classifier is adapted to the specific target task), we assume access to abundant training data and are interested in the generalization ability of the invariant subspace to previously unseen domains (the classifier generalizes to new domains without retraining). Moreover, we show that DICA generalizes or is closely related to many well-known dimension reduction algorithms including kernel principal component analysis (KPCA) (Schölkopf et al., 1998; Fukumizu et al., 2004), transfer component analysis (TCA) (Pan et al., 2011), and covariance operator inverse regression (COIR) (Kim and Pavlovic, 2011), see §2.4. The performance of DICA is analyzed theoretically §§2.5 and demonstrated empirically §§3 .
本工作的创新之处有两方面。首先，DICA算法提取了不变量：即在各个领域间迁移的特征。它不仅最小化了边缘分布之间的差异 P(X)，而且保留了后验中编码的函数关系 P(Y∣X)。由此产生的学习算法非常简单。其次，先前的领域自适应研究主要集中在使用来自许多不同领域的数据来特别提高目标任务的性能，这一现象在训练过程中可以观察到（分类器被适配到特定的目标任务），我们假设可以访问大量的训练数据，并关注不变子空间对之前未见过的领域的泛化能力（分类器在没有重新训练的情况下泛化到新领域）。此外，我们展示了DICA算法与许多知名的降维算法有泛化关系或紧密相关，包括核主成分分析（KPCA）（Schölkopf等人，1998；Fukumizu等人，2004）、迁移成分分析（TCA）（Pan等人，2011）和协方差算子逆回归（COIR）（Kim和Pavlovic，2011），详见第2.4节。DICA的性能通过理论分析 §§2.5 和实证演示 §§3 得到验证。
Related work. Domain generalization is a form of transfer learning, which applies expertise acquired in source domains to improve learning of target domains (cf. Pan and Yang (2010) and references therein). Most previous work assumes the availability of the target domain to which the knowledge will be transferred. In contrast, domain generalization focuses on the generalization ability on previously unseen domains. That is, the test data comes from domains that are not available during training.
相关工作。领域泛化是迁移学习的一种形式，它将源领域中获得的专门知识应用于提高目标领域学习（参见Pan和Yang（2010）及其中引用的文献）。大多数之前的工作假设目标领域是已知的，知识将转移到该领域。相比之下，领域泛化关注的是对之前未见过的领域的泛化能力。也就是说，测试数据来自训练期间不可用的领域。
Recently, Blanchard et al. (2011) proposed an augmented SVM that incorporates empirical marginal distributions into the kernel. A detailed error analysis showed universal consistency of the approach. We apply methods from Blanchard et al. (2011) to derive theoretical guarantees on the finite sample performance of DICA.
最近，Blanchard等人（2011）提出了一种增强的支持向量机（SVM），该算法将经验边缘分布融入核函数中。详细误差分析表明该方法具有普遍一致性。我们应用Blanchard等人（2011）的方法，推导出关于DICA在有限样本性能的理论保证。
Learning a shared subspace is a common approach in settings where there is distribution mismatch. For example, a typical approach in multitask learning is to uncover a joint (latent) feature/subspace that benefits tasks individually (Argyriou et al., 2007; Gu and Zhou, 2009; Passos et al., 2012). A similar idea has been adopted in domain adaptation, where the learned subspace reduces mismatch between source and target domains (Gretton et al., 2009; Pan et al., 2011). Although these approaches have proven successful in various applications, no previous work has fully investigated the generalization ability of a subspace to unseen domains.
在存在分布不匹配的设置中，学习共享子空间是一种常见方法。例如，在多任务学习中的典型方法是发现一个共同的（潜在的）特征/子空间，以分别惠及各个任务（Argyriou等人，2007；Gu和Zhou，2009；Passos等人，2012）。类似的想法已经在域自适应中被采用，其中学习的子空间减少了源域和目标域之间的不匹配（Gretton等人，2009；Pan等人，2011）。尽管这些方法在各种应用中已被证明是成功的，但之前的工作并未完全研究子空间在未见域上的泛化能力。

2. Domain-Invariant Component Analysis
2. 域不变成分分析

Let X denote a nonempty input space and Y an arbitrary output space. We define a domain to be a joint distribution PXY on X×Y ,and let PX×Y denote the set of all domains. Let PX and PY∣X denote the set of probability distributions PX on X and PY∣X on Y given X respectively.
令X表示非空输入空间，Y表示任意输出空间。我们定义域为X×Y上的联合分布PXY，并令PX×Y表示所有域的集合。令PX和PY∣X分别表示在给定X时X上的概率分布PX和Y上的概率分布PY∣X的集合。
We assume domains are sampled from probability distribution P on PX×Y which has a bounded second moment, i.e., the variance is well-defined. Domains are not observed directly. Instead,we observe N samples S={Si}i=1N ,where Si={(xk(i),yk(i))}k=1ni is sampled from PXYi and each PXY1,…,PXYN is sampled from P . Since in general PXYi≠PXYj ,the samples in S are not i.i.d. Let P^i denote empirical distribution associated with each sample Si . For brevity,we use P and PX interchangeably to denote the marginal distribution.
我们假设领域是从在 PX×Y 上的概率分布 P 中采样的，该分布具有有界的二阶矩，即其方差是明确定义的。领域并不是直接观察到的。相反，我们观察到 N 的样本 S={Si}i=1N，其中 Si={(xk(i),yk(i))}k=1ni 是从 PXYi 中采样的，而每个 PXY1,…,PXYN 是从 P 中采样的。由于通常 PXYi≠PXYj，S 中的样本并不是独立同分布的。令 P^i 表示与每个样本 Si 相关的经验分布。为了简洁起见，我们交替使用 P 和 PX 来表示边缘分布。
Let H and F denote reproducing kernel Hilbert spaces (RKHSes) on X and Y with kernels k:X×X→R and l:Y×Y→R ,respectively. Associated with H and F are mappings x→ϕ(x)∈H and y→φ(y)∈F induced by the kernels k(⋅,⋅) and l(⋅,⋅) . Without loss of generality,we assume the feature maps of X and Y have zero means,i.e., ∑k=1n⁡ϕ(xk)=0=∑k=1n⁡φ(yk) . Let ∑xx,∑yy,∑xy ,and ∑yx be the covariance operators in and between the RKHSes of X and Y .
令 H 和 F 表示在 X 和 Y 上的再生核希尔伯特空间（RKHSes），分别具有核 k:X×X→R 和 l:Y×Y→R。与 H 和 F 相关联的是由核 k(⋅,⋅) 和 l(⋅,⋅) 引发的映射 x→ϕ(x)∈H 和 y→φ(y)∈F。不失一般性，我们假设 X 和 Y 的特征映射具有零均值，即 ∑k=1n⁡ϕ(xk)=0=∑k=1n⁡φ(yk)。令 ∑xx,∑yy,∑xy 和 ∑yx 分别表示 X 和 Y 的再生核希尔伯特空间之间的协方差算子。
Objective. Using the samples S ,our goal is to produce an estimate f:PX×X→R that generalizes well to test samples St={xk(t)}k=1nt drawn according to some unknown distribution Pt∈PX (Blanchard et al.,2011). Since the performance of f depends in part on how dissimilar the test distribution Pt is from those in the training samples, we propose to preprocess the data to actively reduce the dissimilarity between domains. Intuitively, we want to find transformation B in H that (i) minimizes the distance between empirical distributions of the transformed samples B(Si) and (ii) preserves the functional relationship between X and Y ,i.e., Y⊥X∣B(X) . We formulate an optimization problem capturing these constraints below.
目标。使用样本 S，我们的目标是产生一个估计 f:PX×X→R，该估计可以很好地推广到根据某个未知分布 Pt∈PX 抽取的测试样本 St={xk(t)}k=1nt（Blanchard et al., 2011）。由于 f 的性能部分依赖于测试分布 Pt 与训练样本中的分布的差异程度，我们提议预处理数据以主动减少域之间的差异。直观上，我们希望在 H 中找到变换 B，使得 (i) 最小化变换样本的实证分布之间的距离 B(Si)，并且 (ii) 保留 X 与 Y 之间的函数关系，即 Y⊥X∣B(X)。我们在下面构建了一个优化问题来捕捉这些约束。

2.1. Distributional Variance
2.1. 分布方差

First, we define the distributional variance, which measures the dissimilarity across domains. It is convenient to represent distributions as elements in an RKHS (Berlinet and Agnan, 2004; Smola et al., 2007; Sripe-rumbudur et al., 2010) using the mean map
首先，我们定义分布方差，它衡量了域之间的差异。将分布表示为 RKHS（Berlinet 和 Agnan, 2004; Smola et al., 2007; Sriperumbudur et al., 2010）中的元素使用均值映射是很方便的。
(1)μ:PX→H:P↦∫Xk(x,⋅)dP(x)=:μP.
We assume that k(x,x) is bounded for any x∈X such that Ex∼P[k(x,⋅)]<∞ . If k is characteristic then (1) is injective, i.e., all the information about the distribution is preserved (Sriperumbudur et al., 2010). It also holds that EP[f]=⟨μP,f⟩H for all f∈H and any P .
我们假设对于任何 x∈X 使得 Ex∼P[k(x,⋅)]<∞ 时，k(x,x) 是有界的。如果 k 是特征性的，那么 (1) 是单射的，即分布的所有信息都被保留（Sriperumbudur et al., 2010）。它也成立，即对于所有 f∈H 和任何 P，EP[f]=⟨μP,f⟩H。
We decompose P into PX ,which generates the marginal distribution PX ,and PY∣X ,which generates posteriors PY∣X . The data generating process begins by generating the marginal PX according to PX . Conditioned on PX ,it then generate conditional PY∣X according to PY∣X . The data point (x,y) is generated according to PX and PY∣X ,respectively. Given set of distributions P={P1,P2…,PN} drawn according to PX ,define N×N Gram matrix G with entries
我们将 P 分解为 PX，它生成了边缘分布 PX，以及 PY∣X，它生成了后验分布 PY∣X。数据生成过程从根据 PX 生成边缘分布 PX 开始。在给定 PX 的条件下，它接着根据 PY∣X 生成条件分布 PY∣X。数据点 (x,y) 分别根据 PX 和 PY∣X 生成。给定一组根据 PX 绘制的分布 P={P1,P2…,PN}，定义 N×N 格拉姆矩阵 G，其条目为
(2)Gij:=⟨μPi,μPj⟩H=∬k(x,z)dPi(x)dPj(z),
for i,j=1,…,N . Note that Gij is the inner product between kernel mean embeddings of Pi and Pj in H . Based on (2), we define the distributional variance, which estimates the variance of the distribution PX :
对于 i,j=1,…,N。注意 Gij 是 H 中 Pi 和 Pj 的核均值嵌入之间的内积。基于（2），我们定义了分布方差，它估计分布 PX 的方差：
Definition 1. Introduce probability distribution P on H with P(μPi)=1N and center G to obtain the covariance operator of P ,denoted as ∑:=G−1NG− G1N+1NG1N . The distributional variance is
定义 1。在 H 上引入概率分布 P，具有 P(μPi)=1N 和中心 G，以获得 P 的协方差算子，记作 ∑:=G−1NG− G1N+1NG1N。分布方差是
(3)VH(P):=1Ntr(∑)=1Ntr(G)−1N2∑i,j=1N⁡Gij.
The following theorem shows that the distributional variance is suitable as a measure of divergence between domains.
下面的定理表明，分布方差作为域之间差异的度量是合适的。
Theorem 1. Let P―=1N∑i=1N⁡Pi . If k is a characteristic kernel,then VH(P)=1N∑i=1N⁡‖μPi−μP‖H2=0 if and only if P1=P2=⋯=PN .
定理 1。设 P―=1N∑i=1N⁡Pi。如果 k 是一个特征核，那么 VH(P)=1N∑i=1N⁡‖μPi−μP‖H2=0 当且仅当 P1=P2=⋯=PN。
To estimate VH(P) from N sample sets S={Si}i=1N drawn from P1,…,PN ,we define block kernel and coefficient matrices
为了从 N 样本集 S={Si}i=1N 中估计 VH(P)，这些样本集是从 P1,…,PN 中抽取的，我们定义块核和系数矩阵
K=(K1,1⋯K1,N⋮⋱⋮KN,1⋯KN,N)∈Rn×n,
Q=(Q1,1⋯Q1,N⋮⋱⋮QN,1⋯QN,N)∈Rn×n,
where n=∑i=1N⁡ni and [Ki,j]k,l=k(xk(i),xl(j)) is the Gram matrix evaluated between the sample Si and Sj . Following (3),elements of the coefficient matrix Qi,j∈Rni×nj equal (N−1)/(N2ni2) if i=j ,and −1/(N2ninj) otherwise. Hence,the empirical distributional variance is
其中 n=∑i=1N⁡ni 和 [Ki,j]k,l=k(xk(i),xl(j)) 是在样本 Si 和 Sj 之间评估的格拉姆矩阵。遵循 (3)，系数矩阵 Qi,j∈Rni×nj 的元素等于 (N−1)/(N2ni2)，如果 i=j，否则等于 −1/(N2ninj)。因此，经验分布方差是
(4)V^H(S)=1Ntr(∑^)=tr(KQ)
Theorem 2. The empirical estimator V^H(S)= 1Ntr(∑^)=tr(KQ) obtained from Gram matrix
定理2。由格拉姆矩阵得到的经验估计器 V^H(S)= 1Ntr(∑^)=tr(KQ)

is a consistent estimator of VH(P) .
是 VH(P) 的一致估计量。

2.2. Formulation of DICA
2.2. DICA 的公式化

DICA finds an orthogonal transform B onto a low-dimensional subspace (m≪n) that minimizes the distributional variance VH(S) between samples from S , i.e. the dissimilarity across domains. Simultaneously, we require that B preserves the functional relationship between X and Y ,i.e. Y⊥X∣B(X) .
DICA 寻找一个正交变换 B 到低维子空间 (m≪n)，以最小化来自 S 的样本之间的分布方差 VH(S)，即跨域的不相似性。同时，我们要求 B 保持 X 和 Y 之间的函数关系，即 Y⊥X∣B(X)。
Minimizing distributional variance. To simplify notation,we "flatten" {(xk(i),yk(i))k=1ni}i=1N to {(xk,yk)}k=1n where n=∑i=1N⁡ni . Let bk= ∑i=1n⁡βkiϕ(xi)=Φxβk be the kth basis function of B where Φx=[ϕ(x1),ϕ(x2),…,ϕ(xn)] and βk are n -dimensional coefficient vectors. Let B= [β1,β2,…,βm] and Φ~x denote the projection of Φx onto bk ,i.e., Φ~x=bk⊤Φx=βk⊤Φx⊤Φx=βk⊤K . The kernel on the B -projection of X is
最小化分布方差。为了简化符号，我们将 {(xk(i),yk(i))k=1ni}i=1N "展平" 到 {(xk,yk)}k=1n，其中 n=∑i=1N⁡ni。令 bk= ∑i=1n⁡βkiϕ(xi)=Φxβk 为 kth 的 B 基函数，其中 Φx=[ϕ(x1),ϕ(x2),…,ϕ(xn)] 和 βk 是 n 维系数向量。令 B= [β1,β2,…,βm] 和 Φ~x 表示 Φx 在 bk 上的投影，即 Φ~x=bk⊤Φx=βk⊤Φx⊤Φx=βk⊤K。在 B 投影上的 X 的核是
(5)K~:=Φ~x⊤Φ~x=KBB⊤K.
After applying transformation B ,the empirical distributional variance between sample distributions is
应用变换 B 后，样本分布之间的经验分布方差是
(6)V^H(BS)=tr(K~Q)=tr(B⊤KQKB)
Preserving the functional relationship. The central subspace C is the minimal subspace that captures the functional relationship between X and Y ,i.e. Y⊥X∣C⊤X . Note that in this work we generalize a linear transformation C⊤X to nonlinear one B(X) . To find the central subspace we use the inverse regression framework, (Li, 1991):
保留功能关系。中心子空间 C 是能够捕捉 X 与 Y 之间功能关系的最小子空间，即 Y⊥X∣C⊤X 。注意，在这项工作中我们将线性变换 C⊤X 推广到非线性变换 B(X) 。为了找到中心子空间，我们使用了逆回归框架（Li，1991）：
Theorem 3. If there exists a central subspace C=[c1,…,cm] satisfying Y⊥X∣C⊤X ,and for any a∈Rd,E[a⊤X∣C⊤X] is linear in {ci⊤X}i=1m ,then E[X∣Y]⊂span{∑xxci}i=1m .
定理3。如果存在一个满足 Y⊥X∣C⊤X 的中心子空间 C=[c1,…,cm]，且对于任意的 a∈Rd,E[a⊤X∣C⊤X] 在 {ci⊤X}i=1m 中是线性的，那么 E[X∣Y]⊂span{∑xxci}i=1m 。
It follows that the bases C of the central subspace coincide with the m largest eigenvectors of V(E[X∣Y]) premultiplied by ∑xx−1 . Thus,the basis c is the solution to the eigenvalue problem V(E[X∣Y])∑xxc=γ∑xxc . Alternatively,for each ck one may solve
因此，中心子空间的基 C 与 m 最大的特征向量相一致，这些特征向量乘以 V(E[X∣Y]) 。因此，基 c 是特征值问题 V(E[X∣Y])∑xxc=γ∑xxc 的解。或者，对于每个 ck ，人们也可以解决...
maxck∈Rd⁡ck⊤∑xx−1V(E[X∣Y])∑xxckck⊤ck
under the condition that ck is chosen to not be in the span of the previously chosen ck . In our case, x is mapped to ϕ(x)∈H induced by the kernel k and B has nonlinear basis functions ck∈H,k=1,…,m . This nonlinear extension implies that E[X∣Y] lies on a function space spanned by {∑xxck}k=1m ,which coincide with the eigenfunctions of the operator V(E[X∣Y]) (Wu, 2008; Kim and Pavlovic, 2011). Since we always work in H ,we drop ϕ from the notation below. To avoid slicing the output space explicitly (Li, 1991; Wu, 2008), we exploit its kernel structure when estimating the covariance of the inverse regressor. The following result from Kim and Pavlovic (2011) states that,under a mild assumption, V(E[X∣Y]) can be expressed in terms of covariance operators:

定理4。如果对于所有 f∈H，存在 g∈F 使得 E[f(X)∣y]=g(y) 对于几乎每一个 y 成立，那么
(7)V(E[X∣Y])=∑xy∑yy−1∑yx.

where ε smoothes the affinity structure of the output space Y ,thus acting as a kernel regularizer. Since we are interested in the projection of ϕ(x) onto the basis functions bk ,we formulate the optimization in terms of βk . For a new test sample xt ,the projection onto basis function bk is ktβk ,where kt= [k(x1,xt),…,k(xn,xt)] .
其中 ε 平滑了输出空间的亲和结构 Y ，因此充当核正则化器。由于我们关注的是 ϕ(x) 在基函数 bk 上的投影，我们用 βk 来表述优化问题。对于新的测试样本 xt ，其在基函数 bk 上的投影是 ktβk ，其中 kt= [k(x1,xt),…,k(xn,xt)] 。
The optimization problem. Combining (6) and (8),DICA finds B=[β1,β2,…,βm] that solves
优化问题。结合（6）和（8），DICA 发现 B=[β1,β2,…,βm] 解决了

The numerator requires that B aligns with the bases of the central subspace. The denominator forces both dissimilarity across domains and the complexity of B to be small, thereby tightening generalization bounds, see §§2.5 . 分子要求 B 与中心子空间的基对齐。分母强制跨域的相似度以及 B 的复杂性保持较小，从而收紧泛化界限，参见 §§2.5 。将（9）重写为约束优化（见补充材料）得到拉格朗日函数

其中 Γ 是包含拉格朗日乘子的对角矩阵。将（10）对 B 的导数设为零，得到广义特征值问题：

Algorithm 1 Domain-Invariant Component Analysis
Input: Parameters λ,ε ,and m≪n .
Sample S={Si={(xk(i),yk(i))}k=1ni}i=1N .
Output: Projection Bn×m and kernel K~n×n .
1: Calculate gram matrix [Kij]kl=k(xk(i),xl(j)) and [Lij]kl=l(yk(i),yl(j)).
: Supervised: C=L(L+nεI)−1K2 .
Unsupervised: C=K2 .

Output B and K~←KBB⊤K .

Transformation B corresponds to the m leading eigenvectors of the generalized eigenvalue problem (11)1 .
变换 B 对应于广义特征值问题 (11)1 的 m 主特征向量。
The inverse regression framework based on covariance operators has two benefits. First, it avoids explicitly slicing the output space, which makes it suitable for high-dimensional output. Second, it allows for structured outputs on which explicit slicing may be impossible, e.g., trees and sequences. Since our framework is based entirely on kernels, it is applicable to any type of input and output variables, as long as the corresponding kernels can be defined.
基于协方差算子的逆回归框架有两个优点。首先，它避免了显式地切割输出空间，这使得它适用于高维输出。其次，它允许结构化输出，对于这些输出，显式切割可能是不可行的，例如，树和序列。由于我们的框架完全基于核，它适用于任何类型的输入和输出变量，只要可以定义相应的核。

2.3. Unsupervised DICA
2.3. 无监督DICA

In some application domains, such as image denois-ing, information about the target may not be available. We therefore derive an unsupervised version of DICA. Instead of preserving the central subspace, unsupervised DICA (UDICA) maximizes the variance of X in the feature space,which is estimated as 1ntr(B⊤K2B) . Thus, UDICA solves
在某些应用领域，如图像去噪，可能无法获取关于目标的信息。因此，我们推导了DICA的无监督版本。无监督DICA（UDICA）不是保持中心子空间，而是最大化特征空间中 X 的方差，该方差估计为 1ntr(B⊤K2B) 。因此，UDICA解决了
(12)maxB∈Rn×m⁡1ntr(B⊤K2B)tr(B⊤KQKB+B⊤KB).
Similar to DICA, the solution of (12) is obtained by solving the generalized eigenvalue problem
与DICA类似，(12)的解通过解决广义特征值问题获得
(13)1nK2B=(KQK+K)BΓ.
UDICA is a special case of DICA where L=1nI and ε→0 . Algorithm 1 summarizes supervised and unsupervised domain-invariant component analysis.
UDICA是DICA的一个特例，其中 L=1nI 和 ε→0 。算法1总结了监督和无监督的域不变成分分析。

2.4. Relations to Other Methods
2.4. 与其他方法的关系

The DICA and UDICA algorithms generalize many well-known dimension reduction techniques. In the supervised setting,if dataset S contains samples drawn from a single distribution PXY then we have KQK= 0 . Substituting α:=KB gives the eigenvalue problem 1nL(L+nεI)−1Kα=KαΓ ,which corresponds to covariance operator inverse regression (COIR) (Kim and Pavlovic, 2011).
DICA和UDICA算法推广了许多已知的降维技术。在监督设置中，如果数据集 S 包含从单一分布 PXY 中抽取的样本，那么我们有 KQK= 0 。代入 α:=KB 得到特征值问题 1nL(L+nεI)−1Kα=KαΓ ，这对应于协方差算子逆回归（COIR）（Kim和Pavlovic，2011）。
If there is only a single distribution then unsupervised DICA reduces to KPCA since KQK=0 and finding B requires solving the eigensystem KB=BΓ which recovers KPCA (Schölkopf et al., 1998). If there are two domains,source PS and target PT ,then UDICA is closely related - though not identical to - Transfer Component Analysis (Pan et al., 2011). This follows from the observation that VH({PS,PT})= ‖μPS−μPT‖2 ,see proof of Theorem 1.
如果只有一个分布，那么无监督DICA简化为KPCA，因为 KQK=0 ，并且找到 B 需要解决特征系统 KB=BΓ ，这恢复了KPCA（Schölkopf等人，1998）。如果有两个域，源 PS 和目标 PT ，那么UDICA与迁移成分分析（Pan等人，2011）密切相关，尽管不是完全相同。这是从观察到的 VH({PS,PT})= ‖μPS−μPT‖2 得出的，参见定理1的证明。

2.5. A Learning-Theoretic Bound
2.5. 学习理论的界限

We bound the generalization error of a classifier trained after DICA-preprocessing. The main complication is that samples are not identically distributed. We adapt an approach to this problem developed in Blanchard et al. (2011) to prove a generalization bound that applies after transforming the empirical sample using B . Recall that B=ΦxB .
我们限制了经过DICA预处理后训练的分类器的泛化误差。主要复杂之处在于样本并非同分布。我们采用了Blanchard等人（2011年）为这一问题开发的策略，以证明在通过 B 转换经验样本后适用的一种泛化界限。回想一下 B=ΦxB 。
Define kernel k¯ on P×X as k¯((P,x),(P′,x′)):= kP(P,P′)⋅kX(x,x′) . Here, kX is the kernel on HX and the kernel on distributions is kP(P,P′):=κ(μP,μP′) where κ is a positive definite kernel (Christmann and Steinwart,2010; Muandet et al.,2012). Let ΨP denote the corresponding feature map.
在 P×X 上定义核函数 k¯ 为 k¯((P,x),(P′,x′)):= kP(P,P′)⋅kX(x,x′) 。在这里，kX 是 HX 上的核函数，而分布上的核函数是 kP(P,P′):=κ(μP,μP′) ，其中 κ 是一个正定核（Christmann和Steinwart, 2010; Muandet等人，2012）。令 ΨP 表示相应的特征映射。
Theorem 5. Under reasonable technical assumptions, see Supplementary, it holds with probability at least 1−δ that,
定理5。在合理的技术假设下，详见补充材料，它至少以 1−δ 的概率成立，即，
sup∥f∥H≤1⁡|EP∗EPℓ(f(X~ijB),Yi)−EP^ℓ(f(X~ijB),Yi)|2
≤c11Ntr(B⊤KQKB)
+tr(B⊤KB)(c2N(log⁡1δ+2log⁡N)n+c3log⁡1δ+c4N).
The LHS is the difference between the training error and expected error (with respect to the distribution on domains P∗ ) after applying B .
左边是应用 B 后训练误差和期望误差（相对于域 P∗ 上的分布）之间的差异。
The first term in the bound,involving tr(B⊤KQKB) , quantifies the distributional variance after applying the transform: the higher the distributional variance, the worse the guarantee, tying in with analogous results in Ben-David et al. (2007; 2010). The second term in the bound depends on the size of the distortion tr(B⊤KB) introduced by B : the more complicated the transform, the worse the guarantee.
界中的第一项，涉及 tr(B⊤KQKB) ，量化了应用转换后的分布方差：分布方差越高，保证越差，这与Ben-David等人（2007；2010）中的类似结果相联系。界中的第二项取决于由 B 引入的失真 tr(B⊤KB) 的大小：转换越复杂，保证越差。
1 In practice,it is more numerically stable to solve the generalized eigenvalue problem 1nL(L+nεIn)−1K2B= (KQK+K+λI)BΓ ,where λ is a small constant.
1 在实际中，解决广义特征值问题 1nL(L+nεIn)−1K2B= (KQK+K+λI)BΓ 更数值稳定，其中 λ 是一个小常数。
Figure 2. Projections of a synthetic dataset onto the first two eigenvectors obtained from the KPCA, UDICA, COIR, and DICA. The colors of data points corresponds to the output values. The shaded boxes depict the projection of training data, whereas the unshaded boxes show projections of unseen test datasets. The feature representations learnt by UDICA and DICA are more stable across test domains than those learnt by KPCA and COIR.
图 2. 将合成数据集投影到由 KPCA、UDICA、COIR 和 DICA 得到的前两个特征向量上。数据点的颜色对应于输出值。阴影框描绘了训练数据的投影，而非阴影框显示了未见测试数据集的投影。UDICA 和 DICA 学习到的特征表示在测试域上比 KPCA 和 COIR 学习到的更稳定。
The bound reveals a tradeoff between reducing the distributional variance and the complexity or size of the transform used to do so. The denominator of (9) is a sum of these terms, so that DICA tightens the bound in Theorem 5.
该界限揭示了减少分布方差与用于此目的的变换的复杂性或大小之间的权衡。公式（9）的分母是这些项的总和，因此 DICA 在定理 5 中收紧了界限。
Preserving the functional relationship (i.e. central subspace) by maximizing the numerator in (9) should reduce the empirical risk EP^ℓ(f(X~ijB),Yi) . However,a rigorous demonstration has yet to be found.
通过最大化公式（9）中的分子来保持函数关系（即中心子空间）应该会减少经验风险 EP^ℓ(f(X~ijB),Yi)。然而，尚未找到严格的证明。

3. Experiments
3. 实验

We illustrate the difference between the proposed algorithms and their single-domain counterparts using a synthetic dataset. Furthermore, we evaluate DICA in two tasks: a classification task on flow cytometry data and a regression task for Parkinson's telemonitoring.
我们使用合成数据集来说明提出算法与其单一领域对比算法之间的差异。此外，我们在两个任务上评估了 DICA：一个是流式细胞术数据的分类任务，另一个是帕金森病远程监测的回归任务。

3.1. Toy Experiments
3.1. 玩具实验

We generate 10 collections of ni∼Poisson(200) data points. The data in each collection is generated according to a five-dimensional zero-mean Gaussian distribution. For each collection, the covariance of the distribution is generated from Wishart distribution W(0.2×I5,10) . This step is to simulate different marginal distributions. The output value is y= sign(b1⊤x+ϵ1)⋅log⁡(|b2⊤x+c+ϵ2|) ,where b1,b2 are the weight vectors, c is a constant,and ϵ1,ϵ2∼N(0,1) . Note that b1 and b2 form a low-dimensional subspace that captures the functional relationship between X and Y . We then apply the KPCA,UDICA,COIR, and DICA algorithms on the dataset with Gaussian RBF kernels for both X and Y with bandwidth parameters σx=σy=1,λ=0.1 ,and ε=10−4 .
我们生成了10个包含 ni∼Poisson(200) 数据点的集合。每个集合中的数据是根据五维零均值高斯分布生成的。对于每个集合，分布的协方差是从Wishart分布 W(0.2×I5,10) 生成的。这一步是为了模拟不同的边缘分布。输出值是 y= sign(b1⊤x+ϵ1)⋅log⁡(|b2⊤x+c+ϵ2|) ，其中 b1,b2 是权重向量，c 是常数，且 ϵ1,ϵ2∼N(0,1) 。请注意 b1 和 b2 形成了一个低维子空间，该子空间捕获了 X 和 Y 之间的功能性关系。然后我们在数据集上应用了KPCA、UDICA、COIR和DICA算法，对于 X 和 Y 都使用了高斯径向基函数核，并且带宽参数分别为 σx=σy=1,λ=0.1 和 ε=10−4 。
Fig. 2 shows projections of the training and three previously unseen test datasets onto the first two eigenvectors. The subspaces obtained from UDICA and DICA are more stable than for KPCA and COIR. In particular, COIR shows a substantial difference between training and test data, suggesting overfitting.
图2显示了训练数据集和三个之前未见过的测试数据集在第一和第二特征向量上的投影。UDICA和DICA得到的子空间比KPCA和COIR更稳定。特别是，COIR在训练数据和测试数据之间显示出显著差异，这表明了过拟合。

3.2. Gating of Flow Cytometry Data
3.2. 流式细胞术数据的门控

Graft-versus-host disease (GvHD) occurs in allogeneic hematopoietic stem cell transplant recipients when donor-immune cells in the graft recognize the recipient as "foreign" and initiate an attack on the skin, gut, liver, and other tissues. It is a significant clinical problem in the field of allogeneic blood and marrow transplantation. The GvHD dataset (Brinkman et al., 2007) consists of weekly peripheral blood samples obtained from 31 patients following allogenic blood and marrow transplant. The goal of gating is to identify CD3+CD4+CD8β+ cells,which were found to have a high correlation with the development of GvHD (Brinkman et al., 2007). We expect to find a subspace of cells that is consistent to the biological variation between patients, and is indicative of the GvHD development. For each patient, we select a dataset that contains sufficient numbers of the target cell populations. As a result, we omit one patient due to insufficient data. The corresponding flow cytometry datasets from 30 patients have sample sizes ranging from 1,000 to 10,000,and the proportion of the CD3+CD4+CD8β+ cells in each dataset ranges from 10% to 30% ,depending on the development of the GvHD.
移植物抗宿主病（GvHD）发生在同种异体造血干细胞移植受者中，当移植物中的供者免疫细胞将受者识别为“外来”并开始对皮肤、肠道、肝脏和其他组织发起攻击时。它是同种异体血液和骨髓移植领域的一个重大临床问题。GvHD数据集（Brinkman等人，2007年）由31名患者在同种异体血液和骨髓移植后获得的每周外周血样本组成。门控的目标是识别 CD3+CD4+CD8β+ 细胞，这些细胞被发现与GvHD的发展高度相关（Brinkman等人，2007年）。我们期望找到与患者间生物学变异一致性且能指示GvHD发展的细胞子空间。对于每位患者，我们选择包含足够数量目标细胞群体的数据集。因此，由于数据不足，我们省略了一名患者。30名患者的相应流式细胞术数据集样本量在1,000到10,000之间，每个数据集中 CD3+CD4+CD8β+ 细胞的比例根据GvHD的发展从 10% 到 30% 不等。
To evaluate the performance of the proposed algorithms,we took data from N=10 patients for training, and the remaining 20 patients for testing. We subsample the training sets and test sets to have 100 , 500, and 1,000 data points (cells) each. We compare the SVM classifiers under two settings, namely, a pooling SVM and a distributional SVM. The pooling SVM disregards the inter-patient variation by combining all datasets from different patients, whereas the distributional SVM also takes the inter-patient variation into account via the kernel function (Blanchard et al., 2011)
为了评估所提出算法的性能，我们从 N=10 名患者中获取数据进行训练，剩余的20名患者用于测试。我们对训练集和测试集进行子抽样，每个分别包含100、500和1,000个数据点（细胞）。我们在两种设置下比较支持向量机（SVM）分类器，即池化SVM和分布SVM。池化SVM通过将不同患者的所有数据集合并在一起，忽略了患者间的变异，而分布SVM通过核函数（Blanchard等人，2011年）考虑了患者间的变异。
(14)K(x~k(i),x~l(j))=k1(Pi,Pj)⋅k2(xk(i),xl(j))
Table 1. Average accuracies over 30 random subsamples of GvHD datasets. Pooling SVM applies standard kernel function on the pooled data from multiple domains, whereas distributional SVM also considers similarity between domains using kernel (14). With sufficiently many samples, DICA outperforms other methods in both pooling and distributional settings. The performance of pooling SVM and distributional SVM are comparable in this case.
表1. 在30个随机子样本的GvHD数据集上的平均准确率。池化支持向量机在多个域的合并数据上应用标准核函数，而分布支持向量机还使用核（14）考虑域之间的相似性。在样本足够多的情况下，DICA在池化和分布设置中都优于其他方法。在这种情况下，池化支持向量机和分布支持向量机的性能相当。

where x~k(i)=(Pi,xk(i)) and k1 is the kernel on distributions. We use k1(Pi,Pj)=exp⁡(−‖μPi−μPj‖H2/2σ12) and k2(xk(i),xl(j))=exp⁡(−‖xk(i)−xl(j)‖2/2σ22) ,where μPi is computed using k2 . For pooling SVM,the kernel k1(Pi,Pj) is constant for any i and j . Moreover,we use the output kernel l(yk(i),yl(j))=δ(yk(i),yl(j)) where δ(a,b) is 1 if a=b ,and 0 otherwise. We compare the performance of the SVMs trained on the preprocessed datasets using the KPCA, COIR, UDICA, and DICA algorithms. It is important to note that we are not defining another kernel on top of the preprocessed data. That is,the kernel k2 for KPCA,COIR, UDICA, and DICA is exactly (5). We perform 10-fold cross validation on the parameter grids to optimize for accuracy.
其中 x~k(i)=(Pi,xk(i)) 和 k1 是分布上的核。我们使用 k1(Pi,Pj)=exp⁡(−‖μPi−μPj‖H2/2σ12) 和 k2(xk(i),xl(j))=exp⁡(−‖xk(i)−xl(j)‖2/2σ22)，其中 μPi 是通过 k2 计算得到的。对于池化支持向量机，核 k1(Pi,Pj) 对任何 i 和 j 都是常数。此外，我们使用输出核 l(yk(i),yl(j))=δ(yk(i),yl(j))，其中 δ(a,b) 在 a=b 时为1，否则为0。我们比较了使用KPCA、COIR、UDICA和DICA算法预处理数据集上训练的支持向量机的性能。重要的是要注意，我们并没有在预处理数据之上定义另一个核。也就是说，对于KPCA、COIR、UDICA和DICA，核 k2 完全等于（5）。我们在参数网格上进行10折交叉验证以优化准确率。
Table 1 reports average accuracies and their standard deviation over 30 repetitions of the experiments. For sufficiently large number of samples, DICA outperforms other approaches. The pooling SVM and distributional SVM achieve comparable accuracies. The average leave-one-out accuracies over 30 subjects are reported in Table 2 (see supplementary for more detail).
表1报告了在30次重复实验中的平均准确率和标准差。对于样本数量足够大的情况，DICA优于其他方法。池化支持向量机和分布支持向量机达到了相当的准确率。表2报告了30个受试者的平均留一法准确率（更多细节请参见补充材料）。

3.3. Parkinson's Telemonitoring
3.3. 帕金森病的远程监测

To evaluate DICA in a regression setting, we apply it to a Parkinson’s telemonitoring dataset 2 . The dataset consists of biomedical voice measurements from 42 people with early-stage Parkinson's disease recruited for a six-month trial of a telemonitoring device for remote symptom progression monitoring. The aim is to predict the clinician's motor and total UPDRS scoring of Parkinson's disease symptoms from 16 voice measures. There are around 200 recordings per patient.
为了在回归设置中评估DICA，我们将其应用于帕金森病远程监测数据集 2 。该数据集包括42名早期帕金森病患者在远程症状进展监测的六个月试验中招募的生物医学语音测量数据。目标是根据16项语音测量预测临床医生的帕金森病症状的电机和总UPDRS评分。每位患者大约有200次录音。
We adopt the same experimental settings as in §§3.2 , except that we employ two independent Gaussian Process (GP) regression to predict motor and total UP-DRS scores. For COIR and DICA, we consider the output kernel l(yk(i),yl(j))=exp⁡(−‖yk(i)−yl(j)‖2/2σ32) to fully account for the affinity structure of the output variable. We set σ3 to be the median of motor and total UPDRS scores. The voice measurements from 30 patients are used for training and the rest for testing.
我们采用了与 §§3.2 相同的实验设置，不同之处在于我们使用了两个独立的高斯过程（GP）回归来预测电机和总UPDRS评分。对于COIR和DICA，我们考虑输出核 l(yk(i),yl(j))=exp⁡(−‖yk(i)−yl(j)‖2/2σ32) 以完全考虑输出变量的亲和结构。我们设置 σ3 为电机和总UPDRS评分的中位数。使用30名患者的语音测量数据进行训练，其余用于测试。
Fig. 3 depicts the results. DICA consistently, though not statistically significantly, outperforms other approaches, see Table 3. Inter-patient (i.e. across domain) variation worsens prediction accuracy on new patients. Reducing this variation with DICA improves the accuracy on new patients. Moreover, incorporating the inter-subject variation via distributional GP regression further improves the generalization ability, see Fig. 3.
图3描绘了结果。DICA在性能上始终优于其他方法，尽管在统计学上不显著，具体见表3。患者间（即跨域）变异会降低对新患者预测的准确性。使用DICA减少这种变异可以提高新患者的预测准确性。此外，通过分布高斯过程回归纳入患者间变异可以进一步提高泛化能力，见图3。
2 http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/ datasets/Parkinson's+Telemonitoring
2 http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Parkinson%27s+Telemonitoring
Table 3. Root mean square error (RMSE) of the independent Gaussian Process regression (GPR) applied to the Parkinson's telemonitoring dataset. DICA outperforms other approaches in both settings; and the distributional SVM outperforms the pooling SVM.
表3。独立高斯过程回归（GPR）应用于帕金森病远程监测数据集的均方根误差（RMSE）。DICA在两种设置中均优于其他方法；分布支持向量机（SVM）优于池化SVM。

4. Conclusion and Discussion
4. 结论与讨论

To conclude, we proposed a simple algorithm called Domain-Invariant Component Analysis (DICA) for learning an invariant transformation of the data which has proven significant for domain generalization both theoretically and empirically. Theorem 5 shows the generalization error on previously unseen domains grows with the distributional variance. We also showed that DICA generalizes KPCA and COIR, and is closely related to TCA. Finally, experimental results on both synthetic and real-world datasets show DICA performs well in practice. Interestingly, the results also suggest that the distributional SVM, which takes into account inter-domain variation, outperforms the pooling SVM which ignores it.
总之，我们提出了一个名为领域不变成分分析（DICA）的简单算法，用于学习数据的不变变换，这在理论上和实证上均已证明对于领域泛化具有重要意义。定理5显示了在之前未见过的领域上泛化误差随着分布方差的增长而增长。我们还展示了DICA泛化了核主成分分析（KPCA）和COIR，并与TCA密切相关。最后，在合成数据集和真实世界数据集上的实验结果表明DICA在实践中表现良好。有趣的是，结果还表明，考虑领域间变异的分布支持向量机（distributional SVM）优于忽略这种变异的池化支持向量机（pooling SVM）。
The motivating assumption in this work is that the functional relationship is stable or varies smoothly across domains. This is a reasonable assumption for automatic gating of flow cytometry data because the inter-subject variation of cell population makes it impossible for domain expert to apply the same gating on all subjects, and similarly makes sense for Parkinson's telemonitoring data. Nevertheless, the assumption does not hold in many applications where the conditional distributions are substantially different. It remains unclear how to develop techniques that generalize to previously unseen domains in these scenarios.
本工作的激励假设是，功能关系在领域间是稳定的或变化平滑。这对于流式细胞术数据的自动门控是一个合理的假设，因为细胞群体的个体间变异使得领域专家无法对所有受试者应用相同的门控，同样也适用于帕金森远程监测数据。然而，在许多应用中，条件分布有显著差异时，该假设不成立。在这些情况下，如何开发能够泛化到之前未见过的领域的技术仍然不清楚。
DICA can be adapted to novel applications by equipping the optimization problem with appropriate constraints. For example, one can formulate a semi-supervised extension of DICA by forcing the invariant basis functions to lie on a manifold or preserve a neighborhood structure. Moreover, by incorporating the distributional variance as a regularizer in the objective function, the invariant features and classifier can be optimized simultaneously.
通过为优化问题配备适当的约束，DICA可以适应新颖的应用。例如，可以通过强制不变基函数位于流形上或保持邻域结构来制定DICA的半监督扩展。此外，通过将分布方差作为目标函数的正则化项，可以同时优化不变特征和分类器。
